ComicInfo.Title: The Dumb and Dumber Guide to Sure-Fire Dating Success; 12 Signs That You're a Dummy; Bore Meets World; Who's the Most Important Person of the 20th Century?; Poorly Crafted Commercials; MBA Highlights; A Bad Day for the Tuna Fleet; ...One of Those Obnoxious Pledge Drives; The Story of the Marooned Sailor; Ye Olde Transport Catalogue; Give-Away Items That Would Really Make Money for Business; New Rules for Making Soccer Less Boring; The Chinese Restaurant Zodiac Placemat; In Yo' Face!; Awkward Moments for Limbs to Fall Off; Unusual Sports Camera Angles; Duh-mb and Duh-mber
